response.overview: Enlik is a student who comes to Almaty to pursue her studies. In order to support her family, she gives up on her dream and starts looking for a job. After an accidental incident, she is expelled from the university and hides the truth from her mother. That same night, she meets Arman, a young man who has chosen the path of a musician. As they work together, they gradually grow closer, and their friendship turns into love. However, the big city puts their dreams and feelings to the test, forcing them to make an important choice.
response.title: Gashyqpyn sagan
